items.title: Nicaragua announces release of dozens of prisoners, one day after U.S. demands
items.summary: MEXICO CITY, ‌Jan 10 (Reuters) - Nicaragua's government announced on Saturday that it ‌had freed dozens of people from its national penitentiary system, a ‌day after the United States demanded the release of more than 60 political prisoners in the country. Read full story

items.title: 'There wasn't even time for CPR': Iran medics describe hospitals overwhelmed with dead and injured protesters
items.summary: Health workers in Tehran report being overwhelmed by injured on Friday night as security forces and demonstrators clash.

items.title: Indonesia blocks Grok over non-consensual, sexualized deepfakes
items.summary: Indonesian officials said Saturday that they are temporarily blocking access to xAI’s chatbot Grok.

items.title: 1st LD-Writethru: 2 skiers killed in avalanche in southeast France: media
items.summary: PARIS, Jan. 10 (Xinhua) -- Two French skiers were killed on Saturday after being caught in an avalanche while skiing off-piste in Val-d'Isere in France's Savoie department, local media reported. Read full story

items.title: Urgent: 2 skiers killed in avalanche in southeast France: media
items.summary: PARIS, Jan. 10 (Xinhua) -- Two off-piste skiers were killed in an avalanche on Saturday in southeast France's Val-d'Isere commune, local media reported. Read full story

items.title: A profile of Grubhub parent Wonder, which has raised about $2B and is rolling out robotic meal-assembly tech acquired from Sweetgreen for $186M in November 2025 (Joshua Brustein/Bloomberg)
items.summary:
Joshua Brustein / Bloomberg:
A profile of Grubhub parent Wonder, which has raised about $2B and is rolling out robotic meal-assembly tech acquired from Sweetgreen for $186M in November 2025  —  E-commerce mogul Marc Lore's Wonder is leaning into automation in a $2 billion effort to do to restaurants what Amazon did to shopping.

items.title: Number of prisoners released in Venezuela rises to 18, rights groups say
items.summary: Jan 10 (Reuters) - The number of ‌prisoners released in Venezuela has risen to 18, human rights ‌groups said on Saturday, from nine on Friday afternoon.   Read full story

items.title: Nobel Institute says Peace Prize cannot be transferred after Machado suggestion
items.summary: PALM BEACH, Florida, ‌Jan 10 (Reuters) - The Norwegian Nobel Institute said the Nobel Peace ‌Prize cannot be transferred, shared, or revoked, following remarks by Venezuelan ‌opposition leader María Corina Machado suggesting she might give her 2025 award to U.S. President Donald Trump. Read full story

items.title: Slovakia to sign nuclear energy cooperation agreement with US, PM Fico says
items.summary: Jan 10 (Reuters) - Slovakia ‌will sign an agreement on nuclear power cooperation ‌with the United States next week, Slovak Prime ‌Minister Robert Fico said on Saturday, as the country moves toward a deal to build a new nuclear power unit with U.S. help. Read full story

items.title: Police arrest 29 people during overnight protests in Minneapolis
items.summary: MINNEAPOLIS, ‌Jan 10 (Reuters) - ‌Twenty-nine people were ‌arrested overnight as police responded ‍to protests ‍against federal ‌immigration enforcement in ‍Minneapolis, ​Mayor Jacob ⁠Frey said at a ‌press conference on ⁠Saturday. Read full story

items.title: Ethiopia launches construction of Africa's largest airport
items.summary: ADDIS ABABA, Jan. 10 (Xinhua) -- Ethiopian Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed on Saturday officially launched the construction of the Bishoftu International Airport, which is expected to become Africa's largest aviation hub upon completion. Read full story

items.title: Malaysia’s EV registrations more than doubled in 2025, Proton e.MAS 7 regains #1 spot in December
items.summary: Registrations of electric vehicles (EVs) in Malaysia have hit an all-time high, based on the latest Road Transport Department (JPJ) data. A total of 44,813 EVs were registered in 2025, representing 105.7% growth year-on-year compared to 21,789 EVs in 2024. In December 2025, 8,123 EVs were registered, more than triple the number recorded in December […]

items.title: Kenya approves rollout of injectable HIV prevention drug
items.summary: NAIROBI, Jan. 10 (Xinhua) -- Kenya's Ministry of Health said on Saturday that it has approved the rollout of lenacapavir, a twice-yearly HIV prevention drug, for use in the East African country. Read full story

items.title: Morgan Stanley survey of audio habits in the US: 50% to 60% of listeners aged 18-44 reported listening to AI-generated music for 2.5 to 3 hours per week (Luke Kawa/Sherwood News)
items.summary:
Luke Kawa / Sherwood News:
Morgan Stanley survey of audio habits in the US: 50% to 60% of listeners aged 18-44 reported listening to AI-generated music for 2.5 to 3 hours per week  —  That's enough AI music to last the run time of “Avatar.”  —  Video may have killed the radio star, but AI is starting to dance on its grave.

Whether you’re mapping out a full battlestation overhaul for the new year or eyeing a relatively simple upgrade to your current setup, this week’s roundup delivers plenty of deals worth a closer look. items.title: Bluetti’s New Year Sale takes up to 53% off power stations and bundles + exclusive bonus savings – all from $119
items.summary:
Running alongside the winter backup deals we spotted, Bluetti also has an ongoing New Year Sale with up to 53% discounts across its power stations, bundles, and accessories. One notable return is the new Elite 400 Portable Power Station at $1,221.06 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5TOYS6OFF at checkout, beating out its Amazon pricing by $78. Having been released back in November with an original $2,999 MSRP, the price has since been cut to $2,699 when at full directly from Bluetti’s website, whereas it starts from $1,899 at Amazon. We saw Black Friday and Christmas sales take this model lowest to $1,299, with exclusive savings giving us this same rate we’re seeing again here. You’ll be getting $678 off the going rate during this event ($1,478 off the MSRP) and another shot at the lowest price we have tracked so far. Head below to also browse the full lineup of deals while they’re sticking around.

more…

While the sale continues, you’ll be able to save $600 off the going rate and score this model at the best price we have tracked.
